entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 2:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

Humidity: 78 %

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
